DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center , open-label study evaluate safety/tolerability pharmacodynamics well pharmacokinetic profile ( sub-population analysis ) , 50 evaluable adolescent 12 < 17 year age .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 , Multicenter , Open-label Study Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Pefcalcitol Ointment , 0.005 % , Applied Topically Twice Daily ( BID ) 8 Weeks Adolescent Subjects 12 < 17 Years Age With Plaque Psoriasis
